body.name: TOBUSA Farmhouse Ceramic Table Lamp for Bedroom, 27" Tall Modern Lamp for Living Room End Table with Hand-Carved Base, Rustic White Fabric Shade Bedside Lamp for Nightstand Desk, Rotary Switch No bulb

features: 🌼Modern & Simple Design: TOBUSA farmhouse ceramic table lamp features an elegant and simple design, with an exquisite lamp body and white linen fabric lampshade that creates a comfortable and romantic atmosphere for any corner of the house. The modern white lamp for living room end table of classic and unique design presents elegant appearance, what a fantastic addition to your living room, bedroom, guest room, or office!

🌺Unique Hand-carve Craft: Our stylish ceramic lamps for living room is handmade by experienced craftsmen, with each white lamp body carefully carved to feature irregular vertical stripes, it makes our farmhouse white ceramic desk lamp match most home decorative styles. The heavy-made ceramic lamp body support the whole lamp without any shaking, slippery. Safe lamp to put in your kids room, guests room, nursery room. It's also a perfect housewarming gift for your friends, colleagues and family.

🌻27inch Super Tall lamp: Our modern white bedroom lamps for nightstand is 27in tall and 12.5in wide. Compared with other small lamps, our rustic white lamp shades for table lamp has a wider light range, providing stable and comfortable light. It will be outstanding and attractive where they stands and upgrade your space in bedroom living room guest room reading zone.

☀️Convenient On/Off Switch: Are you still worry about finding the light switch at night? This farmhouse ceramic lamps for nightstand has a rotary switch on the bulb base, which turns clockwise once to open and turns again to close. Even your child can turn on/off light in any dark environments easily. And the cord length total 5.1FT (155cm), it is enough length to allow the modern white table lamp for bedroom to be placed without limitation.

🥰DIY Lighting Effect : Our contemporary tall farmhouse desk lamp supports a variety of E26 bulbs with a maximum power of 60W incandescent bulbs max. You can choose bulbs with different color temperatures to suit different occasions. 2700K warm white light create soft and romantic lighting for sleeping or dancing. 5000K daylight white can provide natural lighting for reading, working and studying. Come and choose the brightness you want!

Versatile application for any room types such as living room bedroom reading room guest room. -Elegant Ceramic Base The heavy-made ceramic lamp body attached with a anti-fell mate, our white ceramic table lamp will standstill on your end table, working desk, nightstand, TV console and etc. It's really a safe choice for your kid and pet. -Easy-reach rotary switch Unlike other lamps come with unstable touch controls, our rotary switch below the socket is so easy to reach and operate for all ages. Just rotate the switch closewise to turn on/off the lamp at your will. -Eye-protection Linen Shade Made with high quality fabric shade, the light comes rather gentle and soft to eyes, releasing you from fatigue,dizzy, headache caused by other cheap thin shade.

Eye-caring White Linen Shade Our living room ceramic lamp attached with elegant white shade and wrapped around a light grey edge, add enough modern comtemporary chic for your home Exquisite Ceramic Lampbase Each white ceramic table lamp is unique due to the delicate handmade lampbody by our craftman. Not just a white ceramic lamp but also an nice gift. Easy-control Rotary Switch This single bedroom white ceramic table lamp constructed with simple ON/OFF rotary switch, it's perfect to stand on your nighstand end table and desk All E26 Base Compatible Adopted with standard E26 socket, you may set up your ideal lighting effect by different E26 bulb such as LED Incandescent Halogen in different color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for Christmas and winter decorations and it was absolutely beautiful. I put a green bulb in that was so pretty through the window at night.It is very sturdy and well made. The shade was easy to put together. I highly recommend this lovely lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice lamp for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lamp nice but lampshade just okay
reviews.reviewText: Nice white ceramic lamp base. Lampshade comes rolled but fairly easy to assemble. Lampshade is less quality than base. Daughter using for college room else I would upgrade lampshade.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handmade elegance for stylish dining illumination
reviews.reviewText: These Farmhouse Ceramic Table Lamps have truly transformed my dining area into a cozy and inviting space! From the moment I received them, I was impressed by the exquisite craftsmanship evident in the handmade carved patterns adorning the ceramic bodies. Each detail tells a story of skilled artistry, adding a touch of rustic charm to my modern decor.The 25-inch height of these lamps is just perfect for creating ambient lighting that enhances the ambiance of any mealtime gathering. The eye-caring white linen shades diffuse the light beautifully, casting a soft and inviting glow across the room. Whether it's a casual family dinner or a more formal occasion, these lamps provide just the right amount of illumination, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere.One of the things I appreciate most about these lamps is their versatility. The simple rotary switch makes them easy to turn on and off, while the compatibility with E26 bulbs allows me to customize the lighting to suit my preferences. Whether I want to create a cozy, intimate setting or brighten up the room for a lively dinner party, these lamps deliver every time. Not only are these lamps stylish and functional, but they also serve as conversation pieces, drawing compliments from guests every time they visit. The combination of the rustic farmhouse aesthetic and modern design elements makes them a standout feature in my dining area, elevating the overall look and feel of the space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such lovely lamps!
reviews.reviewText: These are some very lovely lamps!!The vibe feels more of a Fall to me from these lamps. But they can be used with any decor, really!They are White ceramic bases with beige Fir stems and beige bursts fluttering along the base.The cloth lampshade (this one is White) can easily be changed out for another color, pattern, or easily taken off to clean- as it is clipped on and Velcro'd down!This does hold a standard bulb, so no running around looking for that odd or random bulb to replace a burnt out one.These are heavy! As mentioned prior; the base is ceramic!The plug is on a decently long cord.The light is lovely, especially with this shape shade!The overall aesthetic is perfect for any room decor as the colors are pretty general.The lamps are very easy to finish putting together!And the shades are very easy to clean! All you have to do is open out the velcro side and unclip it from the two wire frames!Get a damp cloth and clean the surface off. Blot it to dry, Lay it out after blotting it, or blot it and then use the hair dryer on the shade before putting it back on the lamp shade frame!These are very lovely lamps!And the asking price is pretty much what I would expect of this quality and item!These are not tiny rechargeable lamps. These are beautiful classic and stylish lamps!I highly Recommend these lamps!They're well worth it!And everyone could use a sturdy pair of lamps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First of all the lamp is a very nice size, height wise. It looks very elegant and nicely made/constructed. I didnt read that it didnt come with a bulb, so that was a bit of a bummer, but didnt take away the beauty of this lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Much larger than the photos make them appear
reviews.reviewText: I originally ordered these lights to go in my bedroom to have some supplemental lighting. However, they were far too large to put on a bookcase or in the other space that I wanted them to go. In lieu of placing them in my bedroom, I decided to replace our current living room lamps with these. Although it was a bummer that I couldn’t fit them in the space that I wanted, they are very well made and I am hopeful that I can find a smaller version of these or a smaller lamp made by the same manufacturer to put in my room. There are a couple things that make these far superior to other lamps that I’ve ordered.The packaging is top notch. All other lamps that I have ordered have had the shades rolled up tightly with a small piece of circular styrofoam in the middle. This creates a major defect when they are unpackaged and you end up with a lot of deformities in the shades that cannot be fixed. The lampshades for these lamps are placed on the outside of the packaging for the main components and are loosely wrapped so that no parts of the shades are in contact with the other. It may not sound like a big deal, but it really is considering that this prevents the shades from being curled up and developing irreversible bumps in them that really detract from the look of the lamp.The lamps come 90% assembled with you only needing to screw in the top socket (make sure to remove the black protector ring) and place the mount for the lampshade. They are designed with the lampshade mount that kind of resembles a bridge. This makes it much easier to just plug and play with your lightbulbs and deletes the step of having to remove the lampshade to replace lightbulbs. So many lamps have this poor design feature that doesn’t make it exactly convenient so I really appreciate that. The light has a dial that you only need to turn once to turn the lamp on/off. In my experience, dials have needed to have a double twist so it’s nice that this only needs one.The pattern of the leaves on the pure white is also absolutely stunning and beautiful. It looks like something you’d find at stores like crate and barrel but at a fraction of the price. It is also very hardy and has some weight to it so I’m not worried about it falling over from a misplaced breath.Because the shade is white, you get an ample amount of light from it. We have smart bulbs that are equivalent to a 60w bulb so they don’t get AS bright as I’d like but this shade really helps with dispersing light into the room to help alleviate some of that dimness.Really, the only bad thing that I can say about this lamp is that you can see the inners of the tops and bottoms of the lampshades (see photos). They are thicker on the ends and it’s almost like you can see glue or something within when the light is on. However, that doesn’t change my opinion about the quality, aesthetic, or functionality of the light so it still gets a full five stars from me.
